name: Scooby-Doo! Case File #2: The Scary Stone Dragon
name_original: Scooby-Doo! Case File #2: The Scary Stone Dragon
description: Shaggy and Scooby win a free trip to China, just in time for the Chinese New Year and the grand opening of Emperor Chu's Underground Palace. Suddenly, a stone dragon statue outside the palace comes to life, frightening all the visitors and ruining the festivities. It's up to you and the gang to find out who is behind this scheme and crack the case of The Scary Stone Dragon.
